text.autoconfig.ironpipes.title: Iron Pipes Config
text.autoconfig.ironpipes.option.openabl: Whether Copper Fittings should have an interactable GUI.
tooltip.ironpipes.dispensing: Whether Copper Pipes should be able to dispense items.
tooltip.ironpipes.dispense_sounds: Whether Copper Pipes will play a sound upon dispensing an item.
tooltip.ironpipes.suction_sounds: Whether Copper Pipes will play a sound upon sucking in a new item.
tooltip.ironpipes.sense_game_events: Whether Copper Pipes will pick up Game Events (Vibrations.)
tooltip.ironpipes.carry_water: Whether Copper Pipes and Fittings can carry Water.
tooltip.ironpipes.carry_lava: Whether Copper Pipes and Fittings can carry Lava.
tooltip.ironpipes.carry_smoke: Whether Copper Pipes and Fittings can carry Smoke.
